column4: does anyone know anything about getting the intel extreme graphics to work in linux?
mine works fine all auto detected from ubuntu install
can you email me your xorg.conf?
but in a really low resolution
ive ran it in my own build of debian before
you need to select that during setup     you can go back in  and select the resolution in the module portion of setup
i have run xorgconfig as well
lol..ubuntu is bad linux.  that's articulate.
